source.query:
SELECT 
  to_char(date_trunc('month', dd), 'YYYYMM') AS yyyymm,
--  to_char(date_trunc('month', dd), 'YYYY12') AS edt,
  judgeKind
FROM CURRENT_DATE dd
CROSS JOIN (
    VALUES 
      ('4304'),('9903')
) AS hs(judgeKind)
;

SELECT 
  to_char(date_trunc('month', dd), 'YYYYMM') AS yyyymm,
--  to_char(date_trunc('month', dd), 'YYYY12') AS edt,
  judgeKind
FROM CURRENT_DATE dd
CROSS JOIN (
    VALUES 
      ('4402')
) AS hs(judgeKind)
;

query.value:
select '@{variables('yyyymm')}' as REQ_DATE, unnest(ARRAY[0,1,2]) as DATA_GBN
;

select BRAND_CODE as BRAND_CODE, '@{variables('yyyymm')}' as REQ_DATE, unnest(ARRAY[0,1,2,3,4,5]) as DATA_GBN 
from cd_ods.tb_fnb_month_brand_price_t
where data_gbn = '0'
and REQ_DATE = '@{variables('yyyymm')}'
;

select BRAND_CODE as BRAND_CODE, '@{variables('yyyymm')}' as REQ_DATE, unnest(ARRAY[1,2]) as DATA_GBN 
from cd_ods.tb_fnb_month_brand_price_t
where data_gbn = '0'
and REQ_DATE = '@{variables('yyyymm')}'
;

select '@{variables('yyyymm')}' as REQ_DATE, unnest(ARRAY[1,2]) as DATA_GBN
;

select '@{variables('yyyymm')}' as REQ_DATE, unnest(ARRAY[0,1,2]) as DATA_GBN 
;

select COMP_NAME as COMP_NAME, '@{variables('yyyymm')}' as REQ_DATE, unnest(ARRAY[0,1,2]) as DATA_GBN 
from cd_ods.tb_fnb_MONTH_BID_RESULT_t
where data_gbn = '0'
and REQ_DATE = '@{variables('yyyymm')}'
;

select COMP_NAME as COMP_NAME, '@{variables('yyyymm')}'  as REQ_DATE, unnest(ARRAY[0,1,2]) as DATA_GBN 
from cd_ods.tb_fnb_MONTH_BID_RESULT_t
where data_gbn = '0'
and REQ_DATE = '@{variables('yyyymm')}' 
;

select COMP_NAME as COMP_NAME,  REQ_DATE, unnest(ARRAY[0,1,2]) as DATA_GBN 
from cd_ods.tb_fnb_MONTH_BID_RESULT_t
where data_gbn = '0'
and REQ_DATE >= to_char(now() - interval '1 month', 'YYYYMM')
;

select COMP_NAME as COMP_NAME, REQ_DATE, unnest(ARRAY[0,1,2]) as DATA_GBN 
from cd_ods.tb_fnb_MONTH_BID_RESULT_t
where data_gbn = '0'
and REQ_DATE >= to_char(now() - interval '1 month', 'YYYYMM')
;

select BRAND_CODE as BRAND_CODE,  REQ_DATE, unnest(ARRAY[0,1,2,3,4,5]) as DATA_GBN 
from cd_ods.tb_fnb_month_brand_price_t
where data_gbn = '0'
and REQ_DATE >= to_char(now() - interval '1 month', 'YYYYMM')
;

select BRAND_CODE as BRAND_CODE,  REQ_DATE, unnest(ARRAY[1,2]) as DATA_GBN 
from cd_ods.tb_fnb_month_brand_price_t
where data_gbn = '0'
and REQ_DATE >= to_char(now() - interval '1 month', 'YYYYMM')
;

select BRAND_CODE as BRAND_CODE,  REQ_DATE, unnest(ARRAY[0,1,2,3,4,5]) as DATA_GBN 
from cd_ods.tb_fnb_month_brand_price_t
where data_gbn = '0'
and REQ_DATE = '202507'
;
